scripts.install: pnpm install && pnpm --prefix frontend install && pnpm --prefix backend install && pnpm --prefix contracts/ethereum install
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "HARDHAT,CONTRACTS,BACKEND,FRONTEND,SOLANA" "pnpm --prefix contracts/ethereum node" "node scripts/deploy-with-delay.js" "pnpm --prefix backend dev" "pnpm --prefix frontend dev" "docker-compose -f contracts/solana/docker-compose.yml up solana-validator"
scripts.dev:no-deploy: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "HARDHAT,BACKEND,FRONTEND,SOLANA" "pnpm --prefix contracts/ethereum node" "pnpm --prefix backend dev" "pnpm --prefix frontend dev" "docker-compose -f contracts/solana/docker-compose.yml up solana-validator"
scripts.build: pnpm compile && pnpm --prefix backend build && pnpm --prefix frontend build
scripts.clean: pnpm --prefix contracts clean && pnpm --prefix frontend clean && pnpm --prefix backend clean
